data_gaps_and_challenges.description: NAICS industry definitions don't map exactly to S&T categories
S&T productive vs unproductive labor distinction not explicit in modern data
data_gaps_and_challenges.mitigation: Apply S&T methodology to classify industries/occupations

data_gaps_and_challenges.description: Fed capacity utilization may not match industry correspondences exactly
data_gaps_and_challenges.mitigation: Use best available aggregation + document divergence
Apply consistent deflation method across full time series

quality_assurance.cross_validation: Compare multiple data sources where available
quality_assurance.temporal_consistency: Check for artificial breaks at transition points
quality_assurance.identity_validation: Verify accounting identities hold in extended data
quality_assurance.expert_review: Independent review of industry correspondences and adaptations
